gameInfo.title: Through The Eyes
gameInfo.description: A VR experience where players explore forest ecosystems as a squirrel and a lumberjack, learning about sustainability, forest regeneration, and climate change mitigation.

educationalFacts: Squirrels bury seeds that grow into trees, aiding forest regeneration.
Deforestation contributes to nearly 15% of global greenhouse gas emissions.
Sustainable forestry practices ensure forest preservation and resource renewal.
Planting saplings during reforestation increases biodiversity and carbon sequestration.
Flying squirrels help spread fungi spores, which are vital for forest health.

updateHighlights: Added new levels focused on the lumberjack's sustainable practices.
Improved visual effects for forest regrowth simulations.
Enhanced user interface for easier navigation.

gameFeatures.description: Experience the forest ecosystem through the eyes of a squirrel or a lumberjack.
Learn how small behaviors impact forest health and climate change.
Participate in activities like burying seeds, cutting trees responsibly, and reforesting.
